    right="Feat 14"

>
[Divine Reflexes](/Feats.aspx?ID=5922) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 98 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only for your champion's reaction.
name: Divine Reflexes
